channel.title: Projects on azkarohbiya
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on azkarohbiya

item.title: Sequential Recommender System
item.description: By using sequential approach, it helps reveal niche and seasonal products, avoiding saturated offers that are commonly driven by massive transaction.

item.title: Propensity Score Matching
item.description: The method is a brach of causal models, improving clarity in impact measurement for non-control experiments, by making artificial apple-to-apple comparable groups.

item.title: Sentiment Annotation
item.description: WordCloud and Graph are used mainly in this analysis in order to understand word frequency and how strong the relation among them.

item.title: Digital DNA
item.description: The algorithm that helps to find artificial control group for apple-to-apple comparison, avoiding bias in measurement impacts
